How the Prophet glorified Allah.ARABIC_TEXT: عَنْ عَبْدِ اللَّهِ بْنِ عَمْرٍو رضي الله عنه قَالَ: ((رَأَيْتُ النَّبيَّ صلى الله عليه وسلم يَعْقِدُ التَّسْبِيحَ)) وفي زيادةٍ: ((بِيَمِينِهِ)).
How the Prophet glorified Allah.TRANSLATED_TEXT: (Tasbeeh, it means here, to say: (Subhanal-lah, alhamdu lillah, Allahu akbar.)) (AAabdullah Ibn AAamr  said: ’I saw the prophet  make tasbeeh with his right hand.)
